auth_sentence.content: The so-called Magnus force on the spinning baseball will be upward for a ball with backspin, and basically it opposes gravity.
auth_sentence.res_content: The so-called Magnus force on the spinning baseball will be upward for a ball with backspin, and basically it opposes gravity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The so-called Magnus force on the spinning baseball will be upward for a ball with backspin, and basically it opposes gravity.

auth_sentence.content: You want to undercut it a bit, which gives it more of a vertical takeoff angle and also gives the ball backspin.

auth_sentence.content: Typically, if you want to hit a long fly ball, you want to put backspin on that ball.
